title: Tibits - Bern Bahnhof
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, European
description: Busy self-serve vegetarian buffet. Spread includes a variety of hot and cold dishes and is charged by weight. Each dish has a label with information on whether it is vegan, ovo, lacto and gluten free. Also offers fresh squeezed fruit juices. Car park at Bern station. Bus or tram 3, 5, 9-14, 17, 19-21, 30.
